body.name: ROJASOP Tall Shoe Rack With Covers, 10 Tier Narrow Shoe Storage Organizer Cabinet for Closet Entryway Garage, Vertical Space Saving Shoe Shelf Stand for 20-22 Pairs Shoes and Boots
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 29 mins
features: 【Large Capacity & Space Saving】ROJASOP 10 tier shoe rack organizer(17.7'' W x 11.8' D x 68.9''H)can accommodates 20-22 pairs of shoes with easy. Narrow shoe shelf design fits in any small spaces in your home, taking up very little floor space while providing plenty of storage space to keep your shoes organized. This vertical shoe rack is great for closet, garage, entrance, hallway, dorm, living room, bedroom and apartment.

【Sturdy Shoe Rack with Covers】This closet shoe rack is consists of robust metal tubes, reinforced plastic connectors, and thickened non-woven fabric. The strengthened stable structure ensures good stability and won't wobble or topple. Cover design protects your shoes from dust and dirt. The 4 side pockets on the covers provide additional storage for umbrellas, keys, gloves and other accessories.

【Fit for Corner & Small Space】This covered shoe rack have a small footprint and is suitable for various spaces, such as entryways, bedrooms, garages, hallways, front of doors, and living rooms! Very useful and versatile organizational shoe holder based on maximizing the storage room by taller tiers and larger and more pockets, allowing you to keep your shoes organized and easily accessible.

【Detachable & Freely DIY Install】The shoe storage organizer can be assembled as a 10 tier shoe storage rack, two 5 tiers shoe shelves, 1*6 tiers plus 1*4 tiers shoe rack or any tiers as you want. Besides, you can remove one shelf to make room for high heels or long boots. The shoe rack organizer can be freely disassembled and DIY as you like to meet your needs for storing different types of shoes.

【Easy to Assemble】The compact shoe organizer for closet is super easy to assemble and disassemble, No extra tools are needed, just follow the steps in the manual for quick and easy installation. In addition, we have prepared a detailed installation video for your reference (the picture part of the product details page). If you have any questions, please contact with us, we have a professional team to solve your problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ROJASOP 10 TIERS TALL SHOE RACK WITH DUST-PROOF COVER ROJASOP covered narrow shoe shelf takes up very little floor space while provides plenty of storage space to keep your shoes organized. Non-woven fabric covers protects your shoes from dust and dirt, making it a great addition to your home.

SAY GOODBYE TO MESS AND MAKE HOME TIDY The enclosed shoe rack helps keeping your favorite shoes easy to find. They are neatly organized and you don't have to go digging through them when you need a pair. Comes with a dust proof cover that you can zipper it up and hide all of the shoes when you need to.

STEADY SUPPORT Easily Store High Heels High heels no longer fall down or fall through the gap. FLEXIBLE INSTALLATION Fits Your Various Needs You can detach the shoe rack into several small shoe shelf and remove one shelf for tall boots. SPACE SAVING NARROW SHOE RACK Ideal For Tight Space Holds lots of shoes, and doesn’t take up too much space.

Can I get a replacement if the parts are missing or damaged in the package? Yes, you can tell us through Amazon email and we will send out replacement ASAP. Will it be difficult to install? Assembly is super easy. In addition to the instructions we have prepared a detailed installation video for your reference. What is the maximum shoe size that can be placed on the shelf? The depth of the shoe rack is 11.8'', which can accommodate shoes within 12 yards. Can this shoe rack be disassembled? Yes, you can remove the covers for open shoe storage; or split the shoe rack into two shoe racks, or increase the layer distance to meet the needs of placing boots.
SUITABLE FOR ANYWHERE IN YOUR HOME

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my shoe tower
reviews.reviewText: Love how sturdy this shoe tower is. My previous one would lean. The design of this is more durable and can handle more weight!The configurability was key. I did not have the same space as described, but the modular design gave me flexibility and I can use the remaining pieces to make a small shoe rack elsewhere in the house.Only downside is some of my wedges or booties are too tall for the space, but I would hate to give up a whole row just for an extra inch vertically. Same with heels, most stick down to the row below or you can put a layer of something across the bars to keep them from falling through. Might have been nice to have a bar 1-2 nches up to hold the heels at an angle? But then you have the same vertical challenge. Not sure how to fix the design, but it still works well enough for me. (I might have too many shoes!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have a small bedroom and lots of shoes that were cluttering up our floor space and closet.This rack was easy to assemble (20 minutes tops), light weight so it’s easy to move around and It’s sturdier than I thought it was going to be.It’s got spaces in the center where my taller boots fit perfectly.I would highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Looks organized.
reviews.reviewText: Must buy1. Easy to assemble2. Sturdy3. Light weight4. 40 pairs of shoes can easily fit.5. Sufficient area to keep box at the middle or on the top, to keep socks.6. Additional hanging pockets to keep miscellaneous things.7. Looks organized8. Black looks stylish9. Easy to clean10. One time purchase and no need to worry for many years..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has a wide sort of deep closet. It is not a walk-in, so she has limited room. Being able to design this shoe rack to fit her closet was ideal, and worked out better than expected!
